message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.MM, cs.AI, cs.CR

The paper focuses on person re-identification using deep convolutional neural networks, which is a computer vision task. Therefore, cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also proposes a new training method and a new feature reweighting layer, which involves machine learning techniques, making cs.LG (Machine Learning) another likely sub-category. Additionally, the paper involves metric learning, which falls under cs.MM (Multimedia). The paper also discusses the limitations of existing methods, which suggests a focus on algorithmic improvements, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) a possible sub-category. Finally, the paper discusses the security implications of person re-identification, which suggests a focus on security and cryptography, making cs.CR (Cryptography and Security) a possible sub-category.
